message: Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'mRanges' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'mBitmapWidth' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'mBitmapHeight' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'mPixelsChecked' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'mPixels' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'mTargetColor' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'mReplacementColor' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'mSelectionThreshold' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
